meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tenderhearted
meanings.sent1: Her tenderheartednesses shone through when she rescued the injured bird.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his tenderheartednesses towards stray animals.
meanings.sent3: His tenderheartednesses sometimes led to him adopting every stray cat in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of harshness, her tenderheartednesses was like a soothing balm.
meanings.sent5: The tenderheartednesses of the nurse made the patients feel cared for and loved.

meanings.definition: The act of showing compassion or kindness towards others
meanings.sent1: Their tenderheartednesses was evident in the way they volunteered at the shelter.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, many people show their tenderheartednesses by donating to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The tenderheartednesses of the children was heartwarming as they shared their toys with the less fortunate.
meanings.sent4: His tenderheartednesses towards strangers was a testament to his genuine nature.
meanings.sent5: The tenderheartednesses of the community was felt by all who received their support.
